from collections import defaultdict

T = int(raw_input())
for i in range(T):
    N = int(raw_input())
    arr = map(int, raw_input().strip().split())
    dep = map(int, raw_input().strip().split())
    store = defaultdict(int)
    for i in range(N):
        for j in range(arr[i],dep[i]):
            store[j] += 1
    print max(store.items(), key=lambda a:a[1])[1]
